Trait Effect:
+5 Industry on generic Makers Quarter in overpopulated cities
Effect does not apply to emblematic districts that count as Makers Quarters
Overpopulated cities are cities that have more Population than they have Specialist Slots

Shared projects are any constructions that can share cost across cities, like Wonders

-3% Population consumption in this city

+1 Industry per overpopulation in this city
+2 on adjacent Farmers Quarters

Historical Background:
Founded by Viking traders and voyagers in the 9th century, the Rusâ€™ were Slavic peoples who traded and settled along the many river routes connecting the Baltic and Black Seas. With religious influence from the Byzantine Empire, the Rusâ€™ were eventually converted to Christianity and adopted many classically Byzantine cultural and religious traditions. Though the Rusâ€™ eventually splintered into many competing states, their empire was the first to unite the East Slavs and many later states have claimed descent from the empire.
